CLUE: Complete set of genetic material of an organism
FOUND IN: Genomic DNA: This is the collective term for all of the DNA found in an organism's genome, including the DNA found in the nucleus of every cell, as well as the mtDNA and chloroplast DNA found in specific cells or tissues.
